name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程將做為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，將教授Fortran 程式語言，包括程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出、輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理、及子程式等課題。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Fortran Language
   Fortran compiler installation / Hello World test.
Week 2: Basic Elements of Fortran (1)
  Unit conversion: Fah-Celsius. Cel-Fahrenheit. HW: USD2TWD.
Week 3: Basic Elements of Fortran (2)
  variable types, arithmetic calculations. 
  HW: spring sys and resistant sys.
Week 4: Program Design and Branching Structures (1)
  Branching structures (conditional statements)
  HW: Quadratic eq., Ex. 3-9, 3-10, 3-11, 3-12
Week 5: Program Design and Branching Structures (2)
  HW: No new assignment. (Ex. 3-9, 3-10, 3-11, 3-12 repeated)
Week 6: Quiz
Week 7: Loops and Character Manipulation (1)
Week 8: Loops and Character Manipulation (2)
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Review of Midterm
Week 11: Basic I/O Concepts (1)
Week 12: Basic I/O Concepts (2)
Week 13: Introduction to Arrays (1)
Week 14: Introduction to Arrays (2)
Week 15: Quiz
Week 16: Introduction to Procedures (1)
Week 17: Introduction to Procedures (2)
Week 18: Final
scorePolicy:
Quiz/attendance:  30%
Midterm: 20%
Final: 50%
---
1. 不遲到,不早退,遵守上課秩序,不打瞌睡,親自簽到. 
2. 無故缺席者，第一次總成績失分 10 分，第二次 20 分 。無故缺席達三次的同學，明年再會 。
3. 3. 遲到, 早退, 秩序不好, 打瞌睡被點到, 上課完FB或其它非關課程之上網動作被抓到, 每次總成績失分 5 分。

注意事項1：課程中若發生違背誠實原則的行為 (作業抄襲, 小考舞弊, 代簽到退等)，學期成績將不及格，且不予寬容。

注意事項2：因故無法上課的同學，事假需事先提出請假文件，病喪假需於事儘快提出請假文件，否則不授予第1項分數。
materials: Stephen J. Chapman, 2008, Fortran 95/2003 For Scientists and Engineers, McGrawHill. ISBN: 978-0-07-128578-0.
